metatags.author: Eugene Scott
metatags.og:title: Jane Sanders: Photo of Bernie's arrest proves his commitment to civil rights | CNN Politics
metatags.og:description: Bernie Sanders’ wife said Saturday that a recently emerged photo of the now-Vermont senator being arrested after protesting segregated housing in the early 1960s is proof of his advocacy for civil rights.
